entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Barrie
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:07 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -2.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Lake Simcoe Regional Airport 1:00 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023
Temperature: -2.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.2 kPa rising
Humidity: 55 %
Wind Chill: -8
Dewpoint: -10.0°C
Wind: W 22 km/h gust 33 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries early this afternoon. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light late this afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill minus 9 this morning and minus 4 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning late this evening. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill minus 5 this evening and minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending in the afternoon then cloudy. Amount 5 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 3. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023
